Architecture Overview

This document describes the high-level architecture of our system.

System Components

The system consists of the following components:

  1. Frontend - React-based web application
  2. Backend - Python FastAPI service
  3. Database - PostgreSQL

Note: All components communicate via REST APIs.

Data Flow

Data flows through the system as follows:

User Request → Frontend → Backend → Database → Response

Security Considerations

Key security measures include:

  • JWT authentication
  • HTTPS encryption
  • Rate limiting

Tip: For more details, see the detailed design documents.

Internal Notes

These are internal notes that should not be in the public docs.
